Ok... This would have been a perfect rip, really. Nice resolution, great size, but I strongly recommend going for the 4.1 or 3.99 Gb files here in TPB. Why? If you're like me this movie will get ruined around 2:3X hours (when Gyllenhaal escapes from the house under the rain and goes to the police until he talks to the prisoner woman) the image gets really, really choppy. It lasts around 5 minutes or so, but as I said "if you're like me" this will ruin the film for you (at least will make you erase it like I did). I kindly ask for uploader to check this stuff before uploading. I tried the movie in two different PCs and I have the same problem, really, frames get a little screwed while sounds continue fine, it looks like a modern videogame running into an old PC for those minutes. I warned you, if you don't care about this issue, this is your rip.
